name: Maria Lopez
quote: Joining Seguidores de Jesus changed my life...
fullStory: Maria found a spiritual family and strength in our community. She shares how her journey deepened her faith and brought healing through service and prayer.

name: Carlos Rivera
quote: Serving in the Youth Ministry gave me purpose...
fullStory: Carlos discovered leadership and a closer relationship with God through the Youth Ministry. His experience has been one of transformation and growth.
